import React from "react"; import { ProSidebar, Menu, MenuItem, SubMenu, SidebarHeader, SidebarContent, SidebarFooter } from "react-pro-sidebar"; import { FaGem, FaList, FaGithub } from "react-icons/fa"; export default function Aside() { const headerStyle = { padding: "24px", textTransform: "uppercase", fontWeight: "bold", letterSpacing: "1px", overflow: "hidden", textOverflow: "ellipsis", whiteSpace: "noWrap" }; return ( Sidebar Example }>New }>Components 3} title="With Suffix" > 1 2 3
Github
); }
